languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, Равор на связи. Экипаж заканчивает выполнение отданных ранее приказов, а я только что получил подтверждение из инженерных палат. Что бы вы там не сделали, варп-двигатель в полной боевой. Мы готовы начать трансляцию, Ваша Светлость.

traits.locale_text: "Мы ожидаем вас, Лорд-капитан. Будьте осторожны, и да хранит вас {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g}".

languages.text: "Lord Captain — Ravor here. The crew are almost finished carrying out the orders given earlier, and I've just received confirmation from the engineering halls. I don't know what you did, but the warp engine's up and raring to go. We're ready to begin the translation to the warp, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, Равор на связи. Экипаж заканчивает выполнение отданных ранее приказов, а я только что получил подтверждение из инженерных палат. Что бы вы там не сделали, варп-двигатель в полной боевой. Мы готовы начать трансляцию, Ваша Светлость.

I don't know what you did, but the warp engine's up and raring to go. We're ready to begin the translation to the warp, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

I don't know what you did, but the warp engine's up and raring to go. We're ready to begin the translation to the warp, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"Lord Captain — Ravor here. The crew are almost finished carrying out the orders given earlier, and I've just received confirmation from the engineering halls. I don't know what you did, but the warp engine's up and raring to go. We're ready to begin the translation to the warp, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"Lord Captain — Ravor here. The crew are almost finished carrying out the orders given earlier, and I've just received confirmation from the engineering halls. I don't know what you did, but the warp engine's up and raring to go. We're ready to begin the translation to the warp, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: “船长老大，我是雷沃。你之前下达的命令，船员已经差不多干完了，我刚刚从工程大厅那边收到了报告。我不知道你是怎么成功的，但亚空间引擎已经准备好再次启动了。我们已经可以跃迁到亚空间了，大人。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain — Ravor here. The crew are almost finished carrying out the orders given earlier, and I've just received confirmation from the engineering halls. I don't know what you did, but the warp engine's up and raring to go. We're ready to begin the translation to the warp, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: “船长老大，我是雷沃。你之前下达的命令，船员已经差不多干完了，我刚刚从工程大厅那边收到了报告。我不知道你是怎么成功的，但亚空间引擎已经准备好再次启动了。我们已经可以跃迁到亚空间了，大人。”

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン ― こちらラヴォアです。クルーは先程の命令の実行をほぼ終え、機関室からの確認を受領しました。何をしたのかはわかりませんが、ワープエンジンは起動し、準備は万端のようです。<歪み>への転移を開始します、陛下」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain — Ravor here. The crew are almost finished carrying out the orders given earlier, and I've just received confirmation from the engineering halls. I don't know what you did, but the warp engine's up and raring to go. We're ready to begin the translation to the warp, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン ― こちらラヴォアです。クルーは先程の命令の実行をほぼ終え、機関室からの確認を受領いたしました。何をしたのかはわかりませんが、ワープエンジンは起動し、準備は万端のようです。ワープへの転移を開始します、{mf|陛下|陛下}」
「ロード・キャプテン ― こちらラヴォアです。クルーは先程の命令の実行をほぼ終え、機関室からの確認を受領しました。何をしたのかはわかりませんが、ワープエンジンは起動し、準備は万端のようです。<歪み>への転移を開始します、陛下」

languages.text: "Lord Captain – hier Ravor. Die Crew hat die vorhin erteilten Befehle fast ausgeführt, und ich habe gerade mit den Maschinenhallen gesprochen. Ich weiß nicht, was Ihr gemacht habt, aber das Warp-Triebwerk läuft und ist einsatzbereit. Wir können den Übertritt in den Warp einleiten, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain — Ravor here. The crew are almost finished carrying out the orders given earlier, and I've just received confirmation from the engineering halls. I don't know what you did, but the warp engine's up and raring to go. We're ready to begin the translation to the warp, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain – hier Ravor. Die Crew hat die vorhin erteilten Befehle fast ausgeführt, und ich habe gerade mit den Maschinenhallen gesprochen. Ich weiß nicht, was Ihr gemacht habt, aber das Warp-Triebwerk läuft und ist einsatzbereit. Wir können den Übertritt in den Warp einleiten, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... ici Ravor. L'équipage est sur le point de terminer les tâches qui lui avaient été confiées, et je viens de recevoir la confirmation de la salle des ingénieurs. Je ne sais pas ce que vous avez fait, mais le moteur Warp tourne comme une horloge. Nous sommes parés à entamer les manœuvres de passage dans le Warp, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain — Ravor here. The crew are almost finished carrying out the orders given earlier, and I've just received confirmation from the engineering halls. I don't know what you did, but the warp engine's up and raring to go. We're ready to begin the translation to the warp, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... ici Ravor. L'équipage est sur le point de terminer les tâches qui lui avaient été confiées, et je viens de recevoir la confirmation de la salle des ingénieurs. Je ne sais pas ce que vous avez fait, mais le moteur Warp tourne comme une horloge. Nous sommes parés à entamer les manœuvres de passage dans le Warp, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, al habla Ravor. La tripulación casi ha terminado de cumplir sus órdenes anteriores y los ingenieros acaban de enviarme su confirmación. No sé cómo lo ha hecho, pero el motor de disformidad está en marcha. Podemos comenzar la transición a la disformidad, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain — Ravor here. The crew are almost finished carrying out the orders given earlier, and I've just received confirmation from the engineering halls. I don't know what you did, but the warp engine's up and raring to go. We're ready to begin the translation to the warp, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, al habla Ravor. La tripulación casi ha terminado de cumplir sus órdenes anteriores y los ingenieros acaban de enviarme su confirmación. No sé cómo lo ha hecho, pero el motor de disformidad está en marcha. Podemos comenzar la transición a la disformidad, mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Ravor konuşuyor. Mürettebat verdiğiniz emirlerin hepsini tamamlamak üzere ve mühendislik salonlarından gelen onay az önce elime geçti. Ne yaptınız bilmem ama öteboyut motoru çalışır durumda ve harekete geçmeye hazır. Öteboyut geçişine başlamaya hazırız {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain — Ravor here. The crew are almost finished carrying out the orders given earlier, and I've just received confirmation from the engineering halls. I don't know what you did, but the warp engine's up and raring to go. We're ready to begin the translation to the warp, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, Ravor konuşuyor. Mürettebat verdiğiniz emirlerin tamamını yerine getirmek üzere ve mühendislik salonlarından gelen onay az önce elime geçti. Ne yaptığınızı bilmiyorum ama öteboyut motoru çalışır durumda ve harekete geçmeye hazır. Öteboyut geçişine başlamaya hazırız {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
